item.description:
Hi guys! It's time for our annual Yankee Swap meet up and we hope everyone can make it! Bring the kids over for Reindeer Games, Santa Says, and a sloppy Kiss under the Mistletoe photo shoot. We will still be collecting cash or credit donations as well as gently used or new pet supplies, food, treats, etc for pets displayed on our Angel Tree. These are dogs & cats that live at local animal shelters still looking for a family to Love them the way you love your Best Friends. Please consider how you can help a pet in need. A special treat for all pets who donate! Check out the details online! http://www.bestfriendspetcare.com/new-press/

Proof of Current Vaccines Required: Rabies, DHLPP, Bordatella
item.name: Yankee Swap!
